price: Ntuzanumvire abahakanyi n’indyarya, kandi ntukite ku bibi byabo (ngo bikubuze gusohoza ubutumwa), ndetse ujye uniringira Allah. Kandi Allah arahagije kuba umurinzi.
arabic: وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَدَعۡ أَذَىٰهُمۡ وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walā tuṭiʿi al-kāfirīna wal-munāfiqīna wadaʿ adhāhum watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
